Uses of Interface
fr.upmc.components.ports.DataTwoWayPortI

  • Packages that use DataTwoWayPortI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces
    Types of offered and required interfaces for components.
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.

    • Uses of DataTwoWayPortI in fr.upmc.components.interfaces

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.interfaces with parameters of type DataTwoWayPortI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataTwoWayI.DataI DataTwoWayI.PullI.request(DataTwoWayPortI requirer)
      used in pull mode to request a piece of data from the other component.
      void DataTwoWayI.PushI.send(DataTwoWayI.DataI d, DataTwoWayPortI sender)
      used in push mode to send a piece of data to the other component.

    • Uses of DataTwoWayPortI in fr.upmc.components.ports

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.ports that implement DataTwoWayPortI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayPort partially implements a data two-way port for components exchanging data with each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.ports with parameters of type DataTwoWayPortI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataTwoWayI.DataI AbstractDataTwoWayPort.request(DataTwoWayPortI requirer)
      requests a data from a peer in pull mode, assuming there is only one peer connected through this port.
      void AbstractDataTwoWayPort.send(DataTwoWayI.DataI d, DataTwoWayPortI sender)
      sneds and receives a piece of data from another component in push mode.
